post.text: Melania and I extend our warmest greetings to those observing Rosh Hashanah here in the United States, in Israel, and around the world.

comment.author: Jayde
comment.text: we love you. but don't play in the mud with Lying Killary. Stick to your plans which is far superior to her rhetoric lying self. You are a fighter but pick and chose your fights. You are going to be President. We need you to rise above her. She is the lowest person. You are way smarter than her. be wise.

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: No she is actually really really smarter

replies.author: Autumn
replies.text: Jayde A ...spoken with all the ignorance America can muster. Which is pretty impressive, I must say.
